eligibility_inclusion.text: diagnosed with either GPA, MPA or EGPA

evidence.quote: who had been diagnosed with either GPA, MPA or EGPA
all patients had been or were positive for ANCA

eligibility_inclusion.text: participated in the VASKA study at Karolinska University Hospital, Sweden, between 2008 and 2022

evidence.quote: who participated in the VASKA study at Karolinska University Hospital, Sweden, between 2008 and 2022

eligibility_inclusion.text: answered at least one of the patient-reported questionnaires

evidence.quote: To be included in the present study, participants had to have answered at least one of the patient-reported questionnaires

eligibility_inclusion.text: Informed consent was obtained from all participants

evidence.quote: Informed consent was obtained from all participants

structured_data.name: Health-related quality of life
structured_data.measure: EuroQoL five-dimension three-level questionnaire (EQ-5D-3L) and visual analogue scale (EQ-VAS)
structured_data.analysis_method: Median and IQR distributions, Mann-Whitney U test or Kruskal-Wallis H test for group comparisons

evidence.quote: To explore health-related quality of life (HROoL), anxiety, depression and fatigue among persons with ANCA-associated vasculitis (AAV)

structured_data.name: Anxiety
structured_data.measure: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Score - Anxiety (HADS-A)
structured_data.analysis_method: Median and IQR distributions, Mann-Whitney U test or Kruskal-Wallis H test for group comparisons

evidence.quote: To explore health-related quality of life (HROoL), anxiety, depression and fatigue among persons with ANCA-associated vasculitis (AAV)

structured_data.name: Depression
structured_data.measure: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Score - Depression (HADS-D)
structured_data.analysis_method: Median and IQR distributions, Mann-Whitney U test or Kruskal-Wallis H test for group comparisons

evidence.quote: To explore health-related quality of life (HROoL), anxiety, depression and fatigue among persons with ANCA-associated vasculitis (AAV)

structured_data.name: Fatigue
structured_data.analysis_method: Median and IQR distributions, Mann-Whitney U test or Kruskal-Wallis H test for group comparisons

evidence.quote: To explore health-related quality of life (HROoL), anxiety, depression and fatigue among persons with ANCA-associated vasculitis (AAV)

structured_data.name: Bivariate correlations with disease activity
structured_data.measure: Spearman's rank-order correlation between disease activity and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D

evidence.quote: Bivariate correlations between disease duration and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D as well as disease activity and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D were performed using Spearman's rank-order correlation

structured_data.name: Bivariate correlations with disease duration
structured_data.measure: Spearman's rank-order correlation between disease duration and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D

evidence.quote: Bivariate correlations between disease duration and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D as well as disease activity and EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, MAF, HADS-A and HADS-D were performed using Spearman's rank-order correlation

structured_data.name: Cluster analysis
structured_data.measure: Hierarchical cluster analysis based on EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, HADS-A and HADS-D
structured_data.analysis_method: Hierarchical agglomerative clustering procedure using average linkage

evidence.quote: A hierarchical cluster analysis was performed to create clusters of individuals with AAV, based on EQ-5D index, EQ-VAS, HADS-A and HADS-D
A total of 296 patients had answered at least one of the patient-reported outcomes and hence were included in the study
EQ-5D-3L was completed by 282 patients, EQ-VAS by 271, HADS by 283 and MAF by 256 patients
